content: For someone who is new to snowshoeing, I would recommend starting with the trails in Arosa or Gstaad. Arosa has a beginner-friendly circular trail that goes around the Obersee lake, which has stunning views of the surrounding mountains. Gstaad also has several easy snowshoeing trails that take you through picturesque Swiss villages and past stunning Alpine landscapes. Both locations offer guided tours and equipment rental, making it easy for beginners to try out snowshoeing.
